C

checkTypeMeal(ArrayList<Item>) - Method in class myfoodora.Restaurant
This function return the type of the meal constituted of items, based on the fact that a meal has a type if and only if all its items has this type.
command(Order) - Method in class myfoodora.Customer
 
computeAverageIncomePerCustomer() - Method in class myfoodora.Manager
 
computeCost() - Method in class myfoodora.Order
Computes the cost of the order according to : price = price_of_order (set by restaurant, including discounts like meal of the week) + serviceFee (set by the system) + price_of_order * markup_percentage - discount due to fidelity cards
computeDueToRestaurant() - Method in class myfoodora.Order
 
computeFinalPrice() - Method in class myfoodora.Order
Computes the cost of the order, taking in account the fidelity cards.

computeTotalProfit() - Method in class myfoodora.Manager

computeVariablesToTargetProfit(double) - Method in interface myfoodora.ProfitPolicy
 
computeVariablesToTargetProfit(double) - Method in class myfoodora.TargetProfitDeliveryCost
Computes the delivery cost necessary to meet targetProfit, based on last month's orders, knowing that : targetProfit = sumOverOrders((markupPercentage*priceOfOrder) - reductionsDueToCards) + numberOfOrders*(serviceFee - deliveryCost)
computeVariablesToTargetProfit(double) - Method in class myfoodora.TargetProfitMarkupPercentage
Computes the markup percentage necessary to meet targetProfit, based on last month's orders, knowing that : targetProfit = sumOverOrders((markupPercentage*priceOfOrder) - reductionsDueToCards) + numberOfOrders*(serviceFee - deliveryCost)
computeVariablesToTargetProfit(double) - Method in class myfoodora.TargetProfitServiceFee
Computes the service fee necessary to meet targetProfit, based on last month's orders, knowing that : targetProfit = sumOverOrders((markupPercentage*priceOfOrder) - reductionsDueToCards) + numberOfOrders*(serviceFee - deliveryCost)
Coordinates - Class in myfoodora
A class to represent de positions and compute distances
